        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	this.spmFoundationConstants = new global.SPMFoundationConstants();
	var gr = new GlideRecord(this.spmFoundationConstants.CAT_ITEM_SUBSCRIBE_TABLE);
	var qc = gr.addQuery('service_offering', current.service_offering);
	gr.addQuery('sc_cat_item', current.sc_cat_item);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.getRowCount() > 0) {
		while (gr.next()) {
			gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Service offering {0} is already connected to catalog item {1}.',[gr.service_offering.getDisplayValue(), gr.sc_cat_item.getDisplayValue()]));
		}
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	} else  {
		catItemExistsInM2m();
	}

	/*
	*Check if current catalog item is already assigned to another offering, we only allow 1:1 
	relation from catalog item to an offering
	*/
	function catItemExistsInM2m() {
		var catGr = new GlideRecord(this.spmFoundationConstants.CAT_ITEM_SUBSCRIBE_TABLE);
		catGr.addQuery('sc_cat_item', current.sc_cat_item);
		catGr.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.getUniqueValue());
		catGr.addNotNullQuery('service_offering');
		catGr.query();
		if (catGr.next()) {
			gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Catalog item {0} is already connected to service offering {1}.',[catGr.sc_cat_item.getDisplayValue(), catGr.service_offering.getDisplayValue()]));
			current.setAbortAction(true);
		}
	}


})(current, previous);]]></script>
